references.paper_title: A marketplace for data: An algorithmic solution
references.reason: This paper introduces the concept of a data marketplace and provides an algorithmic solution for data acquisition, which is the main focus of the current paper.

references.paper_title: Data Shapley: Equitable valuation of data for machine learning
references.reason: This paper proposes Data Shapley, a data valuation method, which the current paper builds upon and improves.

references.paper_title: Data Shapley: Equitable valuation of data for machine learning
references.reason: This paper extends the Data Shapley method and addresses some of its limitations, providing a foundation for the current paper's approach.

references.paper_title: Neural tangent kernel: Convergence and generalization in neural networks
references.reason: This paper introduces the Neural Tangent Kernel (NTK), a theoretical framework used in the current paper to analyze the generalization performance of models trained on selected data.
This book provides the theoretical foundation for the V-optimal experimental design framework, which is the core methodology of the data acquisition method proposed in this paper.
